price: Llegará el momento en que quienes se negaron a creer desearán haber sido musulmanes entregados a la voluntad de Dios.
arabic: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ كَانُواْ مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: rubamā yawaddu alladhīna kafarū law kānū mus'limīna
